name: Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules
description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Shedding flab off your body can be a daunting task and especially if you are an obese or extremely overweight. However, this task has to be accomplished because obesity is the cause of various cardiovascular issues and diabetes. Nutrex Lipo-6 Black capsules will catalyse your workout plan and lets you achieve your weight loss goals in the given time frame. The powerful unflavoured dietary supplement has a high potency, so one pill is enough to create the ripples inside your body. With so many weight-loss formulas in the market.

Benefits

Bitter Orange Extract: Fat Burner

Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Ultra Concentrate (UC) capsules Unflavoured by MPN are so powerful that just one pill a day is enough to blast off that fat off your body, albeit at a steady speed. The supplement is enriched with the properties of Advantra Z Citrus Aurantium that delivers the goodness of bitter orange extract, which as a result aids in faster weight loss. Moreover, the ingredient controls appetite and thereby helps you manage your portion intake and weight loss progress.

Theobromine Anhydrous-The ‘Push Your Limits’ Benefits

Another amazing ingredient in Nutrex Lipo-6 Black (UC) capsules is Theobromine Anhydrous increases mental focus during your training sessions and supports muscle recovery. The compound is similar to caffeine with an only difference for the time the latter stays in the body. In addition to this, Theobromine widens the blood vessels for proper blood and oxygen flow during exercise sessions. The vasodilatation property plays a key role in reducing fat from your body by giving you ample amount of energy to infuse in your training sessions.

Ingredients

Caffeine Anhydrous, Theobromine Anhydrous, Yohimbine Anhydrous, Rauwolscine, Glycerine, vegetable cellulose, water, Polysorbate 80, FD&C Blue 1, FD&C Red 40, FD&C Yellow 6.

Usage

Take 1 Black Capsule in the morning and 1 capsule in the afternoon. Never take more than 2 servings within 24 hours of the timeline. For best results, consume a pill 30 minutes prior to a meal.
short_description:
Nutrex Lipo-6 Black UC-10 capsules

Key Features:

  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black Improves metabolism
  • Aids in faster fat-loss
  • Formulated as liquid capsules for faster absorption
  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black concentrated fat-loss formula
  • Advantra Z for an increased metabolic rate
  • Theobromine Anhydrous eliminates toxins from your body
  • Nutrex Lipo-6 Black boosts concentration and focus for an effective weight loss session

name: Cellucor Super Hd - Fat Burner 60 Caps
description:
Cellucor Super Hd - Fat Burner 60 Caps

Description

  • High-Definition Fat Burner°
  • Thermogenic 
  • Energy & Focus
  • Dietary Supplement
  • Capsimax - Capsicum Extract

°When combined with a reduced calorie diet and exercise program. For best results, use for 12 weeks.

Suggested Use

Take one serving (1 capsule) with 8-12 fl. oz. of water in the morning, and one serving (1 capsule) with 8-12 fl. oz. of water 5-6 hours later in the mid-afternoon. Once tolerance has been assessed, if you are looking for an additional boost of energy, an additional capsule may be taken with your first serving of the day. Do not take this product within 6 hours of bedtime. Do not exceed 3 capsules per day. Use only as directed.

Other Ingredients

Microcrystalline cellulose, capsule shell (gelatin, titanium dioxide), magnesium stearate, silicon dioxide.

Cellucor Super Hd – Fat Burner 60 Caps

  • High-Definition Fat Burner°

name: Cellucor C4 Ripped Gen 4-30 Servings (Cherry Lemonade)
description:
Cellucor C4 Ripped Gen 4-30 Servings (Cherry Lemonade)

  • Explosive Energy and Cutting Formula
  • Naturally & Artificially Flavored
  • Dietary Supplement
  • 30 Servings
  • Manufactured in a GMP Compliant Facility
  • G4 Chrome Series

Suggested Use

Do not exceed recommended daily intake. Use only as directed. Take one serving (1 scoop) of C4 Ripped, mixed with 6 fl oz of water 20-30 minutes before training. Once tolerance has been assessed and you are looking for an additional boost of energy, take one additional serving (1 scoop) with serving taken before training. Do not exceed 2 scoops per day. Do not use this product within 6 hours of ingesting any other source of caffeine or other stimulants. During your workout, it is recommended that you drink plenty of water or performance beverage such as Cellucor Alpha Amino to stay hydrated. Some individuals may experience a harmless tingling sensation, which is attributed to beta alanine.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, natural & artificial flavors, calcium silicate, silicon dioxide, sucralose, acesulfame potassium, FD&C red lake #40.
short_description:
Cellucor C4 Ripped Gen 4

  • Creatine free pre workout formula
  • Proprietary c4 ripped blend for fat loss

- This fresh technique works within a phospholipid matrix which produces leucine and other amino acids at an early stage during protein development.
- During other techniques, EET is designed to release leucine peptides selectively, causing an improvement in muscle synthesization and development.
- An herbal diuretic is all-natural, gives water loss and helps males and females. MHP Xpel Maximum strength. Xpel is a strong herbal diuretic intended to assist the body dramatically remove surplus fluid from the skin.
- This recipe also provides the correct equilibrium of the essential electrolytes that contribute to the maintenance of body efficiency and body completeness.
Benefits:

  • It also Keeps a normal balance of body fluid.
  • Weight Loss Supplement: Improve a program of weight loss.
  • Maintain Muscle Mass: It encourages a slim muscular appearance.
  • MHP Xpel may reduce the retention of water.
  • Fat Burner: Decreases bloating and further fat loss
Directions for use: 

        - Drink at least 6 to 8 water cups a day, not exceed the suggested dose.
        - Take 4 capsules of MHP Xpel twice daily – once in the morning and once in the evening.

Note: Keep out of reach of children.
